author: craigmcc
msg: Fix two issues with the parse(File) method:
* Create an InputSource using an InputStream rather than a Reader,
so that any character encoding specified within the file can be
* When creating the InputSource, set a System ID on it so that relative
entity references in the XML document can be resolved correctly.

author: rdonkin
msg: CallMethodRule enhancement created by Emmanuel Bourg (gug#8244). This adds support to CallMethodRule for calls to methods which accept no arguments plus tests for same. Patch should be backwards compatible for all real life applications.

author: rdonkin
msg: Updated and corrected digester documentation to reflect use of commons logging (rather than the old print writer)

author: rdonkin
msg: Added digester documentation improvements suggested by Sebastien BRUNOT

author: rdonkin
msg: Depricated Rule(Digester digester) constructor. Also depricated relevant constructors on rule subclasses and added new corresponding constructors. Modified Digester so that it uses the new constructors.
